name: Ember of Torches
description: Powered melee attacks make you and nearby allies Radiant.

name: Ember of Singeing
description: Class ability regeneration is increased while Scorched targets are nearby.

name: Ember of Empyrean
effect: Super hit: +20% weapon damage same element
description: Landing Super hits grants +20% weapon damage for same element weapons for 10s.

name: Ember of Resolve
description: Taking damage grants +15% damage on next attack. Stacks up to 3x.

name: Ember of Char
description: Burning enemies within 15m have their burn duration extended.

name: Ember of Solace
description: Using class abilities grants +40% health regeneration for 5s per activation.

name: Ember of Combustion
description: Critical hits Scorch enemies. Stacks lead to ignition when fully scorched.

name: Ember of Eruption
description: Fully scorched enemies explode dealing +50% damage in AoE.

name: Spark of Shock
description: Your melee attacks jolt targets.

name: Spark of Ions
effect: Defeating jolted targets creates Ionic Traces
description: Ionic Traces travel farther.

name: Spark of Amplitude
description: Dealing Arc damage grants +25% reload speed for 8s.

name: Spark of Feedback
description: Taking Arc damage grants +10% super energy. Chains up to 3 times.

name: Spark of Volts
description: Jolted enemies have doubled chain radius for damage transfer.

name: Spark of Recharge
description: Ability energy generation increased by +35% for 12s.

name: Spark of Momentum
description: Arc weapons have improved knockback and enemy mobility control.

name: Spark of Magnitude
description: Jolting enemies with melee grants +30% damage on next attack for 6s.

name: Echo of Starvation
description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants Devour.

name: Echo of Undermining
description: Your Void grenades weaken targets.

name: Echo of Expulsion
description: Enemies with Void debuffs explode on death with 20m AoE radius.

name: Echo of Persistence
description: Debuffed enemies deal -20% damage. Effect spreads to nearby allies.

name: Echo of Dissolution
description: Void melee destroys enemy cover and exposes them.

name: Echo of Leeching
description: Debuffed enemies have -30% movement speed. Stacks increase duration.

name: Echo of Remnants
description: Dealing Void damage creates a shadow duplicate for 8s.

name: Echo of Replenishment
description: Grenade hits restore 50% health. Debuffed enemies grant +30% restoration.

name: Whisper of Durance
description: Increases the duration of Slow effects.

name: Whisper of Chains
description: Damage resistance while near Stasis crystals.

name: Whisper of Rime
description: Frozen enemies within 25m grant +30% damage reduction.

name: Whisper of Rending
description: Shattering frozen enemies grants +40% critical damage for 5s.

name: Whisper of Conduction
description: Stasis grenades create double the Stasis crystals with wider spread.

name: Whisper of Shards
description: Frozen allies gain +50% damage resistance with damage transfer.

name: Whisper of Fissures
description: Frozen status duration increased by +50%.

name: Whisper of Fractures
description: Frozen enemies falling create crystal explosion with 30m AoE.

name: Thread of Ascent
description: Grants bonus airborne effectiveness while woven.

name: Thread of Generation
description: Dealing damage generates grenade energy.

name: Thread of Propagation
description: Strand melee attacks spawn 2 independent attacking Threadlings.

name: Thread of Finality
description: Threadlings within 20m grant +25% durability buff.

name: Thread of Continuity
description: Unraveled enemies grant allies +20% damage within 15m.

name: Thread of Evolution
description: Damaging enemies duplicates Threadlings. Max 5 Threadlings.

name: Thread of Warding
description: Grapple teleport grants +3s invulnerability. Can be reactivated.

name: Thread of Transmutation
description: Strand connections grant -40% damage taken within 25m radius.

name: Prismatic Harmony
description: Dealing damage with multiple elements grants +15% to all ability energy.

name: Prismatic Convergence
description: Switching between element types grants +20% damage on next attack.
